author: Lai Kew Chai J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Choa Joo Liang v Public Prosecutor
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Lai Kew Chai J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Kelvin Lim Phuan Foo (Kelvin Lim and Partners) and Loo Khee Sheng (K S Loo and Co) for the appellant; Benjamin Yim (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Appellant convicted of possession of diamorphine for the purpose of trafficking/Offence carries mandatory death penalty/Whether appellant could appeal against death sentence imposed on the ground that it was manifestly excessive
